p: An alignment of 133 variable positions among 68 isolates from the Bern outbreak ( Stucki et al., 2015) and an alignment of 150 variable positions among 30 Californian cases from the WTK outbreak were used ( Coscolla et al., 2015a). Possible drug resistance conferring mutations as described in ( Coscolla et al., 2015a) were excluded from the alignment.
